translation.en: I thought we was good buddies.
It's just that it's been so long, I can't remember.
translation.ja: 思い出せないほど ずっと前から
絶対に僕のことを忘れないで

translation.en: Cross my heart and hope to die.
translation.ja: 誓うよ ウソなら死んでもいい

translation.en: [Barry] Hiya, Flossie. Got some good stuff for you today.
translation.ja: 「オリバー･ツイスト」 フロッシー いい物を持ってきたよ
「オリバー･ツイスト」 レスターの家からさ ビリー

translation.en: [Barry] Old Lester never went easy on anything.
translation.ja: ビリー いいわけないだろ

translation.en: [Flossie] I'll give you 20 for this one and them other three.
translation.ja: 全部で20ドルってとこね

translation.en: -[Ollie] Oh, Lord, I'm in a dungeon. -[Barry] Fine. But I paid twice that.
translation.ja: まさか牢獄(ろうごく)？ 定価の半分か

translation.en: All right, I'll see you next time, Flossie. You take care.
translation.ja: また来るよ フロッシー

translation.en: -Billy? Are you out there? -See you later.
translation.ja: ビリー　近くにいるの？

translation.en: It's okay. You're gonna be okay.
translation.ja: うん　きっと大丈夫

translation.en: Can't see a damn thing anymore.
Well... ain't you a handsome fella?
translation.ja: まあ ハンサムさんがいるわ
ありがとう あなたも美人ですよ

translation.en: Easy. Now, I can't quite remember how I got to wherever we are, but I think--
translation.ja: そっとね どうやって ここに来たか 忘れたけど…

translation.en: No jangling. Thank you. I think I might have lost my Billy.
translation.ja: ベタベタ触るのは… どうも ビリーがいない

translation.en: Maybe you could help me escape so I can find him? Please?
translation.ja: 捜したいので 放してもらえますか？ お願いです

translation.en: -[Flossie humming] -I knew this was your dungeon.
translation.ja: やっぱり　ここは牢獄だ

translation.en: I'm warning you. I've got karate in my body and lots of energy,
translation.ja: 言っとくけど 僕は空手の達人だから

translation.en: and if you don't put me down right now-- I'm serious now.
translation.ja: 手を離さないと… 本気だぞ

translation.en: Bunnies are dangerous. We got sharp teeth.
translation.ja: ウサギは危険なんだ 歯も鋭いしね
長くは もたないよ

translation.en: Hey, wait, wait. No. Oh, wait. Don't leave.
translation.ja: 待って 置いていかないで

translation.en: Oh, please. I gotta get out!
-[Flossie] Evening. How y'all folks doing? -Thanks for nothing!
Okay. I guess that's how it is. You're on your own, Ollie.
translation.ja: 仕方ない 自分で何とかしよう

translation.en: Well, I ain't getting stuck in this torture chamber. No, no, no.
translation.ja: この拷問部屋から逃げ出すぞ

translation.en: I gotta think straight. Form a ninja escape plan.
translation.ja: 忍者みたいに 脱出プランを練らなきゃ

translation.en: Oh, thank God you can hear me.
translation.ja: やった　僕の声が聞こえてる

translation.en: Are you trapped in here too?
There's a crazy old lady stabbing people in the ears.
translation.ja: 老婆に耳を刺されたんだ

translation.en: And I'm about to bust out of here and find Billy. You wanna come?
translation.ja: ビリーを捜しに行くけど 君も来る？

translation.en: Which Billy? What's his last name?
translation.ja: どこのビリー？　名字は？

translation.en: Do you remember where he lives? Uh...
translation.ja: 住んでる場所は覚えてる？

translation.en: It's my birthday, and Daddy told me I could pick out whatever I want
translation.ja: 誕生日だから 何でも買ってもらえるの

translation.en: We can play games, snuggle in my bed.
translation.ja: ゲームをして 一緒に眠ろうよ

translation.en: -Billy. -[man] Sue, you gotta hurry up, honey.
translation.ja: ビリー 早く　ママが待ってるぞ
早く　ママが待ってるぞ
オリー　一緒に来る？

translation.en: [sighs] Thank you, really, but... I gotta find my Billy.
translation.ja: 誘いは うれしいけど ビリーを捜さなきゃ

translation.en: He could be out there looking for me.
translation.ja: きっと僕を捜してるから…

translation.en: So... I have to keep looking for him.
translation.ja: きっと僕を捜してるから… 僕もビリーを捜す

translation.en: I'll say a prayer for you tonight. Okay?
translation.ja: 今夜 あなたのために祈るわ
やめろ　待ってくれ
上の階へ ボタンズ

translation.en: She got tired of finding what in her bed?
translation.ja: ベッドに あったのは？
閉じ込められちゃった

translation.en: How am I gonna get out?

translation.ja: 不時着だ 投げ出された

translation.en: We must find the treasure no matter the cost!
translation.ja: 何としても宝を見つけねば

translation.en: As long as these stars are near each other... we shall never be apart.
translation.ja: この星たちが一緒にいる限り 僕らは離れない

translation.en: You... don't look like a Buttons.
translation.ja: 君は ボタンには見えないね
寂しい夜鷹の鳴き声を 　　　　　　聞いてごらん

translation.en: ♪ He sounds too blue to fly ♪
translation.ja: 悲しくて飛べないと 　　　　鳴いているんだ

translation.en: ♪ The midnight train is whining low ♪
translation.ja: 深夜列車は 物悲しげな 　 　音を立てて走っていく

translation.en: ♪ I'm so lonesome I could cry ♪
translation.ja: 泣きたくなるほどの寂しさだ
ボタンズ　この醜い雑種め

translation.en: I think you dropped your balls.

translation.ja: 夜がこんなに長いなんてね

translation.en: You put him down right now. Or I will--
Oh, Lord, what am I doing?
[Flossie] Buttons! Get your ass back to bed!
translation.ja: ボタンズ ベッドに戻りなさい

translation.en: Are you--? Are you all right?
Oh, that just don't look right.
No. Something don't feel quite right.
translation.ja: 目が回ってるみたいだ

translation.en: Ah. How's about helping a feller out?
I am Zozo. And you are...?
Well, good to meet you, Ollie.
Now, let's just turn it down a tetch.
translation.ja: 声を落としてくれるか？
ヒソヒソ声で話すんだ

translation.en: Don't want Flossie letting Buttons back out on the loose, understand?
translation.ja: フロッシーが また犬を放さないようにね

translation.en: Yeah. In light of that, let's get somewhere that Buttons ain't.
translation.ja: よし 念のため ボタンズが来ない所に行こう

translation.en: Stop gulping like a catfish and come on in.
translation.ja: キョロキョロしないで来い

translation.en: [Zozo] Well, what do you know? We're here.
Whoa, now. You're missing part of yourself, bunny. Huh?
translation.ja: おや 少しほつれてるな

translation.en: Your insides is about to become your outsides.
translation.ja: 内側から綿が出てきてる

translation.en: Oh, Lord. We got to fix that before it gets worse.
translation.ja: 穴が広がる前に繕わないと

translation.en: I ain't got no needle and thread, but--
Let's see if the king can help.
-Ah! -You are squirrelier than a pig in a poke.
translation.ja: まったく 落ち着きがないな

translation.en: Et voilà. You are all fixed up.
translation.ja: これでよし 完ぺきだ

translation.en: How did your face get all messed up?
You ought not to point things out like that, Ollie. It ain't polite.
translation.ja: そんなことを聞くのは 失礼だぞ

translation.en: Oh. No, no, no. I'm sorry. I think it looks cool.
translation.ja: ごめん カッコいいと思ってね

translation.en: Like a pirate. I like pirates.
translation.ja: 僕の好きな海賊みたいだ
オリバーは “平和を運ぶ者”を意味する

translation.en: You been here a long time?

translation.ja: モンスターに捕まった？
そう　モンスターだった

translation.en: The Goat Man of Fisherville. He took me away.
translation.ja: フィッシャーヴィルの ヤギ男が私をさらって⸺
地の果てに運んだんだ
首を切られそうになった

translation.en: It ain't funny. I don't like being teased!
translation.ja: 笑えないよ からかわないでくれ

translation.en: Oh, now, quit acting like a stepped-on copperhead.
translation.ja: そんなにビビるなって

translation.en: I ain't no bully. I was just trying to lighten the mood.
translation.ja: 場を和ませようとしただけさ

translation.en: [in squeaky voice] I apologize for my friend. He ain't no count.
translation.ja: 許してやってくれ 彼は悪ふざけしただけさ

translation.en: He's a bit of a clown.
translation.ja: 彼は悪ふざけしただけさ

translation.en: Where did you come from? Why are you here?
translation.ja: どこから来て なぜ ここにいるの？

translation.en: And how come your ears don't stand up straight like Bugs Bunny?
translation.ja: なぜ耳が ピンと立ってないんだ？

translation.en: My best friend Billy, I don't know where he is.
translation.ja: 親友のビリーが どこにいるか分からない
どうしても思い出せないんだ

translation.en: [in normal voice] Well, that ain't no good.
Do you remember how you got here?
translation.ja: どうやって ここに来た？

translation.en: I was trapped. Trapped in a box.
translation.ja: 箱に閉じ込められたんだ

translation.en: It was dark, then... everything started shaking.
translation.ja: 真っ暗な中 すべてが揺れだし⸺

translation.en: And then, boom, it come crashing down like--
translation.ja: 突然 音を立てて崩れた

translation.en: Like that house caught up in a tornado in that movie with the girl and the lion and the metal man.
translation.ja: 家が竜巻に巻き込まれる あの映画のようにね

translation.en: [in squeaky voice] Ha! The Wizard of Oz?
And then this old lady rips me out of the box, and pop!
translation.ja: 老婆が箱から 僕をつかみ取り⸺

translation.en: Hurts my ear, drags me through the store and throws me on a shelf.
translation.ja: 耳を刺して 棚に置いた

translation.en: And a little girl wanted me to go with her, but I didn't. And now-- now--
translation.ja: 少女に誘われたけど断ったよ 今は…

translation.en: Oh, and now I might be here for a long, long time,
translation.ja: ここに長くいるわけには いかないんだ
ここに長くいるわけには いかないんだ それは…
大変だ　ビリーが泣いてる

translation.en: I gotta find him. He needs me.
translation.ja: 見つけなきゃ ビリーには僕が必要だ

translation.en: [in normal voice] Did your star tell you all that?
translation.ja: 星を見て分かったのか？

translation.en: I don't need to breathe. I need to find Billy.
translation.ja: ビリーを見つけなきゃ

translation.en: Come on, sourpuss, breathe with me.

translation.ja: 記憶って おかしなもんだ

translation.en: You gotta kind of sneak up on them or they'll just disappear.
translation.ja: こっそり近づかないと 消えてしまう

translation.en: To figure out what's in your head...
sometimes you gotta figure out what's in your heart.
translation.ja: 心の中を のぞくべき時もある

translation.en: There be marauders approaching from the starboard side!
translation.ja: 右舷から 略奪者が近づいてくる

translation.en: Damn it, Billy. What's with this mess?
You know better than this. Your mama ain't feeling well.
translation.ja: ママは具合が悪くて 休息が必要なんだ

translation.en: -She needs her rest. -We was just playing.
translation.ja: ママは具合が悪くて 休息が必要なんだ 遊んでただけさ
そうか 分かったよ

translation.en: Billy, you need to grow up a little bit for me. All right?
translation.ja: もう少し成長してくれ いいな？

translation.en: With things how they are, I need you to-- You know, I need you to be tough for me.
translation.ja: こんな状況だから しっかりしてほしい

translation.en: you know, some-- Some baby. Do you understand?
translation.ja: 今は まるで赤ん坊さ 分かるか？

translation.en: Daddy, what's all this ruckus about?
Can't you see that Billy's trying to build an adventure?
translation.ja: ビリーは 冒険に出ようとしてるの

translation.en: But... right now, we are in the presence of the pirate king. [gasps]
translation.ja: でも今 私たちの前に 海賊王がいるのよ

translation.en: Bow to your king, good knight. Come on. Bow.
translation.ja: 王に お辞儀を ほら 早く

translation.en: -Bow to your king, good knight. -You gotta be kidding me.
translation.ja: お辞儀をするの やめろ

translation.en: Hey, come on. Bow. Bow I say! Come on. Bow to your king. Get rid of that hat.
translation.ja: 言ったとおりにして 帽子を脱いで

translation.en: I haven't much time. I must away for a private audience with the king.
translation.ja: 時間がないわ 王と２人きりで話があるの

translation.en: Shall we, king? Here we go.
You know your daddy don't mean nothing, right?
translation.ja: パパの話は気にしないで

translation.en: He's just tired, you know? And there's--
translation.ja: きっと疲れてるのよ だって⸺

translation.en: There's a lot on his shoulders right now.
I don't think he wants me to play with Ollie.
translation.ja: 僕がオリーと遊ぶのを嫌がる

translation.en: Wanna hear a funny story about your daddy? It's a good one.
translation.ja: パパの面白い話を聞きたい？

translation.en: he had this old beagle hound named Princess.
translation.ja: 犬を飼ってたの 名前はプリンセス

translation.en: Sweetest little thing, but she was getting old, hard of hearing.
translation.ja: 老犬だから耳が遠かった

translation.en: -Anyway, your daddy had this Army doll-- -Daddy played with toys?
translation.ja: パパは人形を持ってて… パパが？

translation.en: He sure did. And this one was his favorite.
translation.ja: ええ　兵隊の人形を すごく大事にしてた

translation.en: Well, your daddy goes into the living room
and he sees Princess sitting right on top of Mr. G.I. Joe,
translation.ja: プリンセスが 人形に座ってるのを見つけた

translation.en: but Princess can't hear him because she's deaf and will not move.
translation.ja: でもプリンセスは耳が悪い

translation.en: So your daddy decides he's gonna make her move.
translation.ja: パパはなんとしても 動かそうとした

translation.en: So he rears up, right? He gets ready to hit that old beagle hound with his bare foot,
translation.ja: パパが 後ろに回って 蹴ろうとした瞬間⸺

translation.en: and when he goes to kick her, Princess stands up
translation.ja: プリンセスが立ち上がった

translation.en: and his toe goes right where the sun don't shine.
translation.ja: パパのつま先は 犬のお尻の穴に

translation.en: And when your daddy pulled that toe out, old Princess got her revenge,
translation.ja: パパがつま先を抜いたら 犬は反撃に出た

translation.en: because that Princess just evacuated all over Mr. G.I. Joe.
translation.ja: 人形にウンチを かけまくったの

translation.en: Who did this? Was that that Mike Apple boy?
translation.ja: 誰がやったの？ マイク･アップルって子？

translation.en: He twisted my arm and tried to make me say it.
translation.ja: 僕の腕をひねって 言わせようと…

translation.en: That we ain't your real mama and daddy?
-Okay? Me and your daddy love you-- -I didn't say it, Mama.
translation.ja: 私たちは あなたを… 違うよ ママ

translation.en: No matter how hard he squeezed. I'd never say it.
translation.ja: どんなに痛くても 僕は言わない

translation.en: I know you wouldn't, baby. Come here.
I know you wouldn't. I'm sorry you have to.
translation.ja: つらい目に遭わせて ごめんね

translation.en: But you have to, you know, take up for yourself sometimes.
translation.ja: でも時には 勇気を振り絞らなきゃ

translation.en: You know, he ain't-- He's nothing but a little pissant in a pit bull's body.
translation.ja: 相手は強そうに見えても 所詮 見かけ倒しよ

translation.en: You add anything new to your memory map today?
It's really important, you know? We wanna make sure we're working
translation.ja: 〝想像力のパワー〞 大事なのよ 今までやったことや この先 したいことを⸺

translation.en: at keeping track of all the things that we've done,
translation.ja: 今までやったことや この先 したいことを⸺

translation.en: all the things we hope to do.
stole the stars from the night sky.
translation.ja: 夜空から星たちを盗んだ

translation.en: Turned them to gold and christened them.
translation.ja: それを金に変え こう命名した
“魅惑の双子星(ふたごぼし)”ってね そう

translation.en: And only the pure of heart may wield them.
translation.ja: 純粋な者だけが使えるのよ

translation.en: Are you and your squire pure of heart?
Because if you are not pure of heart and you use these stars, you'll die...
translation.ja: 純粋じゃない者が これを使うと死んでしまう
何が見えた？ 手がかりは？

translation.en: Places he went with Mama and Daddy.
All the things we'd done, all the things we hoped to do.
translation.ja: “今までやったことや この先 したいこと”
ゾゾ　何してるんだ？

translation.en: -Zozo, you done yet? -Good Lord, you're impatient.
translation.ja: ねえ せっかちだな

translation.en: Give me a sec. I need to think.
A map. Well, not... really. Something like a map.
translation.ja: これは手がかりになりそうだ

translation.en: But, Ollie, I know some of these places. Not all of them.
translation.ja: 私は この中の いくつかを知ってる

translation.en: Now, the Dark River, that could be the Ohio.
translation.ja: “暗黒の川”なら オハイオ川かもしれん

translation.en: Mark Twain, not sure about that one. There's some fuzzy areas.
translation.ja: “マーク･トウェイン”は よく分からない

translation.en: I ain't never seen no trolls, but...
If you can remember more, we might be able to use it and find your way home.
translation.ja: もっと思い出せれば 帰り道を見つけられるかも

translation.en: You'd leave here? You'd help me find Billy?
translation.ja: ここを出て 一緒に ビリーを捜してくれる？

translation.en: I didn't mean to give you the wrong impression.
translation.ja: 勘違いさせる気はなかった

translation.en: Don't you have somebody you love?
Somebody that you'd do anything to be with?
translation.ja: 何があっても 一緒にいたい人は？

translation.en: A dancing doll that twirled like a feather on wind.
translation.ja: 羽のように軽やかに舞う 人形だった

translation.en: She's the only one who ever cared for me.
translation.ja: 私を気にかけてくれたのは 彼女だけさ

translation.en: I loved her with all my heart.
translation.ja: 私は心から愛してたんだ
何年も捜してきたんだ

translation.en: And you know what I found?
I'm done searching for things I can't find.
translation.ja: もう見つけるのは諦めた

translation.en: And I think it's best that we just stay put...
translation.ja: だから 今の安全な場所に いられれば⸺

translation.en: You can't trust this old world, Ollie.
translation.ja: 世の中は信用できない

translation.en: If we're gonna do this, partner...
translation.ja: 一緒に捜しに行くには⸺

translation.en: we gotta figure out a way out of here first, don't you think?
translation.ja: まず ここから 脱出しないとな

translation.en: Are you sure Buttons gets out this way?
translation.ja: ボタンズは ここから外へ？

translation.en: That's why they call it a dog door.
translation.ja: “ドッグ･ドア(犬のドア)”と 呼んでるからな
ヒソヒソ声にしなきゃ

translation.en: Well, you got any ideas? Because I am fresh out.
translation.ja: 何か案はあるか？ 私にはない

translation.en: What time does Buttons get up?
translation.ja: ボタンズは何時に起きる？

translation.en: [Ollie] I know karate. I'm an expert in karate and kung fu. Scorpion-style, toad-style, all of it.
translation.ja: 僕は空手とカンフーの 達人なんだ

translation.en: I can kick and flip and spin, so don't you worry about old Buttons.
translation.ja: だから あんな老犬 目じゃないよ

translation.en: [whispering] Where did he go? I can't see him.
translation.ja: どこに行った？ 姿が見えない

translation.en: -You go first. I'm right behind you. -Okay.
translation.ja: 先に行け　後に続く 分かった

translation.en: We don't have time to go back.
Oh, please. Please. We need the star to find Billy!
translation.ja: お願いだよ ビリーを捜すのに必要なんだ

translation.en: Oh, my leg popped out again. Give me a sec.
translation.ja: また脚が抜けた　待ってくれ

translation.en: Go on. Get out of here, Ollie.
-Come on, get up. Get up! -Ollie, get out of here.
translation.ja: ほら 立って 逃げろ
あいつら 強そうでも⸺

translation.en: I was worried. You just left.
translation.ja: 突然 消えたから 心配したんだ
それはライトセーバー？

translation.en: -How did you get lightning on your eye? -Paws off. Swords ain't for bunnies.
translation.ja: その稲妻は？ 触るな ウサギに剣は無用

translation.en: -Who the heck are you anyway? -Whoa, now. Settle down.
translation.ja: あんた 誰？ 落ち着け　彼はオリーだ
落ち着け　彼はオリーだ

translation.en: Wait. Are y'all boyfriend and girlfriend?
translation.ja: もしかして２人は恋人同士？

translation.en: I thought we was good buddies.
It's just that it's been so long, I can't remember.
translation.ja: 思い出せないほど ずっと前から
絶対に僕のことを忘れないで

translation.en: Cross my heart. And I hope to die.
translation.ja: 誓うよ ウソなら死んでもいい
オリー 見つけたよ

translation.en: I found it! I found it! I found it!
translation.ja: やった！　見つけたぞ

translation.en: Filled with danger and mystery, Ollie.
translation.ja: 危険と謎が渦巻いてる

translation.en: Good place to start a quest.
translation.ja: 旅の始まりに ふさわしい

translation.en: Do you think he's out there looking for me?
translation.ja: ビリーは僕を捜してるかな？
